name: Keepfooterbottom
tagline: Keep the footer tag always at the bottom when there are not enough contents
body:
### Welcome
## **Keep your web site's Footer at bottom.**
![screenshot](https://www.diigo.com/file/image/ropdceozcrabearbszbrqpodqs/keep+footer+at+bottom.jpg)
Keep the footer tag always at the bottom when there are not enough contents

[For screenshot](https://www.diigo.com/file/image/ropdceozcrabearbszbrqpodqs/keep+footer+at+bottom.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
